info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 5 at 7:57AM EDT by NWS Peachtree City GA
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City GA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Georgia...
Little River at Newborn Road near Newborn affecting Morgan and Newton Counties.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring.
* WHERE...Little River at Newborn Road near Newborn.
* WHEN...From this morning until further notice.
* IMPACTS...At 12 feet, Flood Stage is reached. Minor flooding begins of woodlands and the natural flood plain of the creek upstream and downstream from the gage on Newborn Road.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 AM EDT Tuesday the stage was 12.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:45 AM EDT Tuesday was 12.4 feet. - Forecast...Waves of light to moderate rainfall will result in continued rises along Little River at Newborn Road through the evening. - Flood stage is 12 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 12.4 feet on 02/07/2020. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE
